summary: Changes the utterly useless Lydia housecarl into a moderately powered; but not overpowered Lydia the Grey! a befitting reward for the dragonborn is to have another dragonborn to aid them in combat!
descriptionHtml:
Changes the utterly useless Lydia housecarl into a moderately powered; but not overpowered Lydia the Grey! a befitting reward for the dragonborn is to have another dragonborn to aid them in combat!

She'll still levels with the dragonborn, she just trades her defense for more offense carries a Daedric Greatsword, Daedric Bow, 472 arrows (a bit too much, I know...) and the clothes of the greybeards!

Personal.Statement. Please notify me upon receiving any bugs, as I doubt there will be... but just do it. =]
author: Bawxer
